Articles.Content:
This game is about building a timeline for future events!

Rules:

You MUST advance at least 1 year per post.

You can advance 25 years at max in one post. (eg: if the game's at 2400, the max year you can do next is 2425)

You can't go backwards in the timeline.

The game will (hopefully) stop at the year 10.000, but you can continue if you want!

It must make sense. (Technology must advance unless a user makes a disaster)

Example:

userA: 2350: First interstellar journey.

userB: 2361: Asteroid impact on earth kills almost all life.

userC: 2375: Humans arrive after interstellar travel.

I'll start!

2017: Probe is launched to Europa (moon) and discovers aminoacids in its water.

Edited November 17, 2014 by gmpd2000
2019: martians are discovered.
2020: Chocolate runs out.

2020: Chocolate runs out.
:gasp: the horror!

2026: A probe from an alien civilization slams into Kansas at Mach 2. Inside of it are metric tons of chocolate.
2027: That probe is being investigated in a top secret facility. Nobody gets the chocolate.
2028: The people of Kansas Riot, demanding chocolate. The United States falls to the Chocolate Mob.

2029

Brazil satisfies world with their soft drink Guarana (yes its an actual drink and its Amazing. Name a type of coke, Guarana is better than it and that is a FACT)

2037

The mothership of an Alien race discover that Guarana makes excellent FTL drive fuel. They warp the worlds supply onto their ships. The Chocolate Mob is re-established.

2038

Members of the Democratic party are tried for illegal smuggling of synthetic chocolate among Elite members.

Next 4 years are prosperous under Republican control of government by making synthec chocolate more available to the people

2040: The Republican Party has so much power that it makes a new Soviet Union out of the USA, which falls in 2050.

2050: The CUSA (Communist USA) collapses into 50 independent countries, who bond together to form the USA again, but in old form.

2051: the British discover FTL and take over brazil to steal the guarana recipie.

2052: the planet England (earth renamed) gains a interstellar empire. voyager 2 slams into the planet the alien probe came from a mach 2
2055: World reverted to 2014 state.

no. you cant do that. not after all that chocolate.

2055 again: all suns descendants shot for heresy/going back in time to change history

no. you cant do that. not after all that chocolate.

2055 again: all suns descendants shot for heresy/going back in time to change history

2056: people in what was the Northern part of the USA finally realize that the South is no longer racist. Both start working together to make a better world
2057: the British overlords discipline those regions for not getting along in the first place. British empire also gains 500 new star systems
2070: Britain becomes the Galactic Britannian Empire after conquering 60% of known star systems.
2071: Scotland gains independence XD
2072: Scotland rebellion crushed by ninjas.

2073

Man by name of Blankity Blank attempts assignation of United England leaders. Stopped by good samaritan with CCW. Does not make world news because of political bias and is deemed "not news worthy"
2073: kerbin found and conquered. cat becomes prime minister of empire

2073: Kerbin found and conquered. Cat becomes prime minister of empire

got sniped
2074: war between cats and England

2075

Cats win

2076 - A small rogue Alcubierre bubble streaks in from interstellar space and disappears into the sun. The density of the solar plasma breaks up the bubble long before it reaches the core, but not before a significant volume of solar material is converted to energy from passing across the bubble wall, and the resultant gamma rays trigger a sudden surge of fusion in a large chunk of the convection zone. This creates a massive ejection of solar plasma of a magnitude never before seen, and the magnetic disturbance knocks out all electronics closer than the orbit of Mars.
2077: cats discover the multiverse, and decide to look for a chocolate universe to end the world chocolate crisis
